body_html: Today's a Google corporate holiday, so followup may be slow, but this looks like it could be a recently introduced bug. By default, TF should be trying to allocate all of the free memory on the GPU, not the total memory. Your error message indicates it's trying to allocate total memory. As @Carmezim notes, there is a work-around.
